metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39796 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: In HarmfulAppWarningActivity of HarmfulAppWarningActivity.java, there is apossible way to trick victim to install harmful app due to atapjacking/overlay attack. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith User execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12Android-12LAndroid ID: A-205595291

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
